meanings.definition: The beliefs, practices, or characteristics of a warlord.
meanings.sent1: His warlordisms included a strict code of loyalty among his followers.
meanings.sent2: The book detailed the various warlordisms of the ancient ruler.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small stature, his warlordisms made him a formidable leader.
meanings.sent4: Her warlordisms in the office earned her the nickname 'The Commander'.
meanings.sent5: The warlordisms of the general were evident in his decisive tactics on the battlefield.

meanings.definition: The actions or behaviors associated with being a warlord.
meanings.sent1: The warlordisms of the conqueror were feared by neighboring kingdoms.
meanings.sent2: The warlordisms of the ruler were marked by aggression and control.
meanings.sent3: His warlordisms at the dinner table included claiming the biggest portion of food.
meanings.sent4: The warlordisms of the CEO were evident in her ruthless business strategies.
meanings.sent5: The warlordisms of the pirate captain were evident in his plundering ways.
